Description: Small Nile silt pottery jar coated with black slip and well burnished; flat base, convex sides, simple rim. On one side blackening of the slip was not entire, and the surface is dark brown with a black top.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, p.152 [50-53]. Most like Black polished ware F91 in Petries’ Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921), but shape closer to Black top red B75c.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1998, 1 Mar-28 Jul . Ravenna, Italy. Museo Nazionale di Ravenna, 'Le origini Dell'Antico Egitto'
